text: Pelophryne (Flathead Toads) is a genus of true toads. They live in the Philippines, Borneo, Malaya, Singapore and Hainan Island, China. ==Species== Binomial name and author Common name Pelophryne albotaeniata White-striped Flathead Toad Pelophryne api Pelophryne brevipes Zamboanga Flathead Toad Pelophryne guentheri Gunther's Flathead Toad Pelophryne lighti Mindanao Flathead Toad Pelophryne linanitensis Das, I. 2008. The Raffles Bulletin of Zoology 56(2): 435â€“443. Pelophryne macrotis Boulenger's Flathead Toad Pelophryne misera Black Flathead Toad Pelophryne murudensis Pelophryne rhopophilius Pelophryne signata Saint Andrew's Cross Toadlet ==References== * . 2007.
